frontmatter.title: Walking through the secret passageways/traboules in Lyon

fields.slug: /secret-passageways-Lyon/Walking through the secret passageways in Lyon/

node.excerpt: A few months ago I went on a solo weekend trip to Lyon. I booked a flight and a hotel and with no actual plan was ready for an adventure. With half-day left after having walked around the top sightseeing spots, I decided to go up to the La Croix-Rousse neighborhood. At the tourist information desk, I've had someone mark some of the passageways…

frontmatter.title: Barcelona recommendations map with local tips

node.excerpt: Living in Barcelona for almost 5 years I have a lot of recommendation of coffee shops, restaurants, place to see, restaurants and touristic attractions. To make it easier to share this with friends I have decided to create a Google Map that can be added as a layer on ones Google Maps. The places I've added have a small note of why I put them on the…

frontmatter.title: The second biggest park in Barcelona

node.excerpt: A long while ago I bought a book called 111 Places In Barcelona That You Must Not Miss and decided to take the challenge to see all these places. Especially during these times when we are not allowed to travel outside of Barcelona, it seems the perfect thing to do. Last night I picked no.78 Parc Central de Nou Barris. frontmatter.title: The Difference Between setTimeout and setInterval

node.excerpt: Until now I was only using setInterval not being aware of setTimeout. To be transparent I didn't need to use it until working on the Speed Writing Game Here's where setTimeout made a difference. I could have gotten way using setInterval for what I needed but it would have meant writing more code unnecessarily.    My approach with setInterval looked…
